name: shopvippremium
description: Shop VIP Premium - E-Commerce Platform for Premium Subscriptions

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn server:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.test: cd backend && python -m pytest && cd ../frontend && yarn test --watchAll=false
scripts.seed-db: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python mega_product_seeder.py
scripts.status: pm2 status && sudo systemctl status nginx mongod
scripts.restart: pm2 restart shopvippremium-backend && sudo systemctl restart nginx

author: Shop VIP Premium
